Messages.Author: Gyöngyver Györffy
Messages.Content: Dear Students, please be aware, that the seminar will be tomorrow (Monday, 13th May) as originally planned and announced in the KVV from 4 p.m. - 8 p.m.!

Messages.Author: Gyöngyver Györffy
Messages.Content: Dear Students, a written essay of personal reworking of the topics introduced in the course (between 10 and 15 pages) will be mandatory as "Abgabeleistung" (final assignment) and complementary work to reach the commitment of the required 30 hours. In the first lecture all the commitments that will follow will be defined in detail.

Messages.Author: Gyöngyver Györffy

Messages.Content: Unlike announced in the KVV the course will start at May 7 at 4pm. The first class will be held online. The link will be provide some days prior to the date, best regards Joerg Gleiter
